And he said<S>559</S> unto me, Son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, stand<S>5975</S> upon thy feet<S>7272</S>, and I will speak<S>1696</S> unto thee.
And the spirit<S>7307</S> entered<S>935</S> into me when he spake<S>1696</S> unto me, and set<S>5975</S> me upon my feet<S>7272</S>, that I heard<S>8085</S> him that spake<S>1696</S> unto me.
And he said<S>559</S> unto me, Son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, I send<S>7971</S> thee to the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, to a rebellious<S>4775</S> nation<S>1471</S> that hath rebelled<S>4775</S> against me: they and their fathers<S>1</S> have transgressed<S>6586</S> against me, even unto this very<S>6106</S> day<S>3117</S>. <sup>nation: Heb. nations</sup>
For they are impudent<S>7186</S> <S>6440</S> children<S>1121</S> and stiffhearted<S>2389</S> <S>3820</S>. I do send<S>7971</S> thee unto them; and thou shalt say<S>559</S> unto them, Thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>. <sup>impudent: Heb. hard of face</sup>
And they, whether they will hear<S>8085</S>, or whether they will forbear<S>2308</S>, (for they are a rebellious<S>4805</S> house<S>1004</S>,) yet shall know<S>3045</S> that there hath been a prophet<S>5030</S> among<S>8432</S> them.
And thou, son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, be not afraid<S>3372</S> of them, neither be afraid<S>3372</S> of their words<S>1697</S>, though briers<S>5621</S> and thorns<S>5544</S> be with thee, and thou dost dwell<S>3427</S> among scorpions<S>6137</S>: be not afraid<S>3372</S> of their words<S>1697</S>, nor be dismayed<S>2865</S> at their looks<S>6440</S>, though they be a rebellious<S>4805</S> house<S>1004</S>. <sup>briers: or, rebels</sup>
And thou shalt speak<S>1696</S> my words<S>1697</S> unto them, whether they will hear<S>8085</S>, or whether they will forbear<S>2308</S>: for they are most rebellious<S>4805</S>. <sup>most: Heb. rebellion</sup>
But thou, son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, hear<S>8085</S> what I say<S>1696</S> unto thee; Be not<S>1961</S> thou rebellious<S>4805</S> like that rebellious<S>4805</S> house<S>1004</S>: open<S>6475</S> thy mouth<S>6310</S>, and eat<S>398</S> that I give<S>5414</S> thee.
And when I looked<S>7200</S>, behold, an hand<S>3027</S> was sent<S>7971</S> unto me; and, lo, a roll<S>4039</S> of a book<S>5612</S> was therein;
And he spread<S>6566</S> it before<S>6440</S> me; and it was written<S>3789</S> within<S>6440</S> and without<S>268</S>: and there was written<S>3789</S> therein lamentations<S>7015</S>, and mourning<S>1899</S>, and woe<S>1958</S>.
